entry.string: Your account has been validated, but must be reviewed by the administrator. You should be activated shortly
entry.translation: Yuoor eccuoont hes beee feleedeted, boot moost be-a refeeooed by zee edmeenistretur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Yuoo shuoold be-a ecteefeted shurtly

entry.translation: Yuoor eccuoont hes beee feleedeted und yuoo cun noo lug in. Bork bork bork!
